---
title: "Example Survival data set"
output: github_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)    
library(broom)
library(survival)
```

```{r}
survfit(Surv(AVAL, CNSR == 1) ~ TRT01P  , data = ADTTE )  %>%
  tidy(fit) %>%
  ggplot(aes(time, estimate, group = strata, colour = strata)) + 
  geom_line() +
  geom_point() 
```
